tool_description: API to get UK postcodes and addresses, validate and much more
name: UKPostCodes
title: UKPostCodes

api_list.name: GET the nearest postcodes information from a postcode
api_list.description: GET the nearest postcodes information from a postcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com/nearest-postcode/ha02qh"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com/nearest-postcode/{postcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET postcode by using outcode and incode
api_list.description: GET postcode by using outcode and incode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com/postcodes/ha0/2qh"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com/postcodes/{outcode}/{incode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukpostcodes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
